lead_paragraph: The quarterbacks coach Jay Paterno was on the sideline for the loss to Nebraska. His father, the fired coach Joe Paterno, stayed at home.
snippet: The quarterbacks coach Jay Paterno was on the sideline for the loss to Nebraska. His father, the fired coach Joe Paterno, stayed at home.
